title: AI in the Real World — Check

questions.question: Which of the following is a real-world application of AI?
options: A recommendation engine on a streaming platform

questions.question: AI systems in healthcare are most commonly used for:
What does model accuracy measure?
options: The speed of the model's predictions
The proportion of correct predictions out of all predictions
The total size of the training dataset
The number of features used by the model

questions.question: Overfitting occurs when a model:
options: Performs well on training data but poorly on new data
Predicts the same value for every input
